title: LoL Client Connection Errors In Ranked
body:
Riot really needs to fix this -garbage- because I'm losing LP in ranked for just not being able to connect to games. I get client errors every game. Fortunately, closing the client and reconnecting solves... Most of the problems. There is however; the problem of reconnecting to a game that is frozen and unable to play or leave the game. Resulting in a loss or "leave" on my account. I have a video sample. 


http://sendvid.com/qk63cd5p

replies.body:
The *reconnect* issue that's mentioned on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) definitely doesn't look related to the video you linked. The symptoms in your video indicate *Packet Loss* or *Extreme Packet Buffering* issues. I'd strongly recommend ensuring all your local network settings are compatible by working through our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you still see issues after those steps so we can troubleshoot further.

The video I linked is a special case that popped up just seconds after doing the reconnect workaround mentioned in the Service Status Page. While it may or may not be related to the connection problem [Discord and Pandora were running but muted for the video as per usual], my point is as I stated before, there are points in the game where I can reconnect before the game starts and times when I cannot reconnect at all.  These particular instances are causing the loss/afk. These connection problems don't always happen but, seem to be appearing in abundance this current patch. Thus my QQ is strong.  Hope I clarified everything.

Losses and AFKs are *really crummy* when they occur due to a technical issue with your computer or network, which is why we should continue to work together to resolve this. Can you let me know if those connection guide steps caused any change in your stability in-game?
